alert.note: Alert for Goshen (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 06 at 11:33PM MDT until July 07 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT FOR NORTHWESTERN SCOTTS BLUFF...SOUTHWESTERN SIOUX AND NORTHEASTERN GOSHEN COUNTIES... At 1133 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Prairie Center to 9 miles east of Jay Em to 12 miles north of Torrington to near Lingle, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Torrington, Mitchell, Morrill, Lingle, Lyman, Prairie Center, Jay Em, Agate Bed National Monument, Henry and Hwy 85 At Dry Rawhide Creek. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Cheyenne.
